code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Button,Modal,ModalHeader,ModalBody,ModalFooter,Form,FormGroup,Input,Label}from"reactstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskEditModal=_ref=>{let{taskData,toggle,onSave}=_ref;const[item,setItem]=useState(taskData);useEffect(()=>{setItem(taskData);},[taskData]);const handleChange=e=>{let{name,value}=e.target;if(e.target.type==="checkbox"){value=e.target.checked;}setItem({...item,[name]:value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{isOpen:true,toggle:toggle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:e=>{onSave(item);e.preventDefault();},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalHeader,{toggle:toggle,children:"Task Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ModalBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormGroup,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{for:"task-title",children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"task-title",name:"title",value:item.title,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter Task Title",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormGroup,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{for:"task-description",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"task-description",name:"description",value:item.description,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter Task description",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormGroup,{check:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Label,{check:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"checkbox",name:"completed",checked:item.completed,onChange:handleChange}),"Completed"]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalFooter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",color:"success",children:"Save"})})]})});};export default TaskEditModal;
